dmca.title: Personal Website and Social Network Details
dmca.body:
Within the last 24 hours a member of your forums has decided to publicize details of my personal website and personal social networks.
I have asked you within your forums to fix this and rectify the situation but you haven't.
As detailed in your forum (which you ignored) and I will now detail here:

http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/3967/7ef76523e54c4847ab5b6cf.png

this is contained within your members signature: KJG

please remove this including any material that mentions unlawfully my domain and username "lagerassassin" / "laggerassassin" the second of which is misspelt
